experiments.title: I made a downdetector for downdetector's downdetector's downdetector
experiments.tldr_markdown:
Bottom line: A tongue-in-cheek, 4×-meta status page that pings a meta-checker via a tiny API; currently “Checking…” and unaffiliated.

# TL;DR
> “A tiny independent status checker that checks the checker that checks the checker that checks Downdetector.”

- **What**: An independent “4× Downdetector” status page for [downdetectorsdowndetectorsdowndetector.com](https://downdetectorsdowndetectorsdowndetector.com/).
- **How**: Calls a small API that pings [Downdetector’s Downdetector’s Downdetector](https://downdetectorsdowndetectorsdowndetector.com/) and reports back.
- **Status now**: Global probe: “Checking…”; HTTP/Latency: —/—; Last checked: just now; Target: [link](https://downdetectorsdowndetectorsdowndetector.com/).
- **Affiliation**: Not linked to any prior detectors, Downdetector, or your ISP.
- **Action**: Refresh to recheck.

experiments.title: I made a downdetector for downdetector's downdetector's downdetector
I made a downdetector for downdetector's downdetector's downdetector
experiments.tldr_markdown:
**Bottom line:** A meta-status site that pings a site that pings a site that pings Downdetector, then tells you if *that* is up. Nothing more, nothing less.

# TL;DR

- **What this is:** A tiny, unaffiliated status checker for [Downdetector's Downdetector's Downdetector](https://downdetectorsdowndetectorsdowndetector.com/) — i.e., **4×-removed** from Downdetector itself.
- **How it works:**  
  - Calls a minimal API  
  - That API pings *Downdetector's Downdetector's Downdetector*  
  - This site then reports HTTP status + latency as a simple table.
- **Current behavior:** Shows a single **“Global probe”** row with status, HTTP code, and latency, plus **“Last checked: Just now”** and a **Refresh** link.
- **Scope & affiliation:**  
  - Not connected to Downdetector, any of the intermediate “detectors,” or your ISP.  
  - Exists purely to answer: *“Is the thing that checks the thing that checks the thing that checks Downdetector working?”*

> “A tiny independent status checker that checks the checker that checks the checker that checks Downdetector.”
